channel.title: Project ConkerScape: Reborn and Reloaded
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/5483/cscapemb3.gif[/img] Project ConkerScape
[b]Introduction[/b][/center] I made this server because now-a-days, private servers are getting ruined. Over half of them have not been touched, just downloaded and ran. Well, I'm getting sick of it, so I decided to do something to it. That's when Project ConkerScape was born.
[center][b]Goals[/b][/center] Of course, I have many goals for my server, but I also have goals for myself. I've coded 7 servers before and ran them, but none of them were too complex and they already had half of the work done for me. So now I'm making a change. I downloaded a clean source to get started on, and I want to code this all with using very limited or no tutorials. I really want to learn alot from this, and seeing as I will mess up alot, the release date isn't going to be for a few months most likely. I will keep this updated though. Here are a few goals of mine: Be extremly stable Add some new items Add recolored items Good PKing, with an anti-mass, right weapon timers, single and multi zones Skulling Prayer works perfect: head icons, draining, can't use 2 of same type Along with many more.
[center][b]Progress[/b][/center] Client- 100% done, added all the items and fixed all the menus Server- 10% done, found a good base
[center][b]Current Task[/b][/center] My current task is: Making Skill Menus Work
[center][b]Pictures[/b][/center] [img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/9940/pic1lc6.png[/img] [img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/7228/pic2av9.png[/img]
[center][b]Credits[/b][/center] Client: 80% - SWAT - Using her client as base client 15% - DOG EATS DOG - Used his recolored items 5% - ME - Changing all the ids around, misc. work
Server: 10% - Juzz - Using his clean source as base 10% - Paladino76, Reforced, Winter Love, I loot I - Refering to their sources when I need to 80% - Me - Everything else

item.title: Project ConkerScape: Reborn and Reloaded
item.dc:creator: @by_by_noob by by noob
item.description:
@by_by_noob wrote:

FINALLY. Make all weapons perfect timing so that weapon switching ACTUALLY HAS A MEANING. there are servers that have perfect timing but all weps are same speed. there would be no point in using a dragon sim towards a dragon 2h because they hit same speed. d2h is stronger tho MAKE THINGS LIKE range-2h or range-g maul possible

Read full topic

me too, hopefully i don’t give up

item.title: Project ConkerScape: Reborn and Reloaded
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[center]

Project ConkerScape

Introduction[/center]
I made this server because now-a-days, private servers are getting ruined. Over half of them have not been touched, just downloaded and ran. Well, I’m getting sick of it, so I decided to do something to it. That’s when Project ConkerScape was born.

[center]Goals[/center]
Of course, I have many goals for my server, but I also have goals for myself. I’ve coded 7 servers before and ran them, but none of them were too complex and they already had half of the work done for me. So now I’m making a change. I downloaded a clean source to get started on, and I want to code this all with using very limited or no tutorials. I really want to learn alot from this, and seeing as I will mess up alot, the release date isn’t going to be for a few months most likely. I will keep this updated though.
Here are a few goals of mine:
Be extremly stable
Add some new items
Add recolored items
Good PKing, with an anti-mass, right weapon timers, single and multi zones
Skulling
Prayer works perfect: head icons, draining, can’t use 2 of same type
Along with many more.

[center]Progress[/center]
Client- 100% done, added all the items and fixed all the menus
Server- 10% done, found a good base

[center]Current Task[/center]
My current task is: Making Skill Menus Work

[center]Pictures[/center]

[center]Credits[/center]
Client:
80% - SWAT - Using her client as base client
15% - DOG EATS DOG - Used his recolored items
5% - ME - Changing all the ids around, misc. work

Server:
10% - Juzz - Using his clean source as base
10% - Paladino76, Reforced, Winter Love, I loot I - Refering to their sources when I need to
80% - Me - Everything else
